name: MYSTIC VR
description: MYSTIC VR is a puzzle adventure that finds you in a magical world which is trapped in eternal night. Find the clues and solve the puzzles to open the doors and activate the crystal spheres to bring back the dawn in this calming, family-friendly experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
